name: Space Conquer (GameRealmMadness)
description:
//** 64x36 WINDOWS PC EXE, HTML5 BROWSER, ANDROID APK **//

STORY:

  • YOU'RE A SPACE CONQUEROR EXPLORING UNKNOWN PLANETS. AN UNSTABLE WORMHOLE CAUSES A FORCED LANDING, WHICH LEADS TO THE DESTRUCTION AND EVACUATION OF THE SHIP.

ATTENTION:

  • PLAY WITH THE PC BROWSER INSTEAD OF USING MOBILE DEVICES. ALSO TRY OUT THE ANDROID VERSION OF THIS GAME.

CONTROLS:

  • Z : JUMP   X : SHOOT
  • ARROW KEYS : MOVEMENT

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • YOU REACHED THE LAND OF THE SLURKS. WATCH OUT FOR RADIATION FROM SLURKS.

MADE USING FUSION FOR

  • LOWREZJAM 2020
